articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: WHO says authorities investigating new COVID-19 variant in England - Reuters
articles.description: The World Health Organization is aware of a new variant of COVID-19 that has emerged in Britain, but there is no evidence the strain behaves differently to existing types of the virus, it said on Monday.
